author: Dan Zak
title: Yacht justice: A new front in the war drags Russia’s oligarchs into the spotlight
description: Moves against certain super-wealthy Russians have emerged as a popular sideshow to an ugly war.
content: Usmanov is one of the Russian elites on whom the United States imposed sanctions and who, in the words of Treasury Secretary Janet L. Yellen, support Russian President Vladimir Putins war of choice a… [+10880 chars]
